data.event: Settlement began around 1714, even though plans for its settlement were made around 1654.
Settlement began around 1714, even though plans for its settlement were made around 1654.
In 1830, part of Goshen was used to form the new Town of Hamptonburgh, and, in 1845, another part was used to form the Town of Chester.
In 1830, part of Goshen was used to form the new Town of Hamptonburgh, and, in 1845, another part was used to form the Town of Chester.
